data_table.description: Diabetes (Derived), Generation 3, New Offspring Spouse, and Omni 2, Exam 1 - Exam 2. Current diabetes status is positive at a specific exam if a study participant reports they are under current treatment for diabetes or they have a blood glucose level of 200 mg/dL or greater. Current diabetes status can change from exam to exam.

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: CURR_DIAB1
variable.comment: Derived variable. For variable information see corresponding documentation.

variable.name: CURR_DIAB2
variable.comment: Derived variable. For variable information see corresponding documentation.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2

variable.name: HX_DIAB1
variable.comment: Derived variable. For variable information see corresponding documentation.

variable.name: HX_DIAB2
variable.comment: Derived variable. For variable information see corresponding documentation.
variable.value: Unknown or did not attend Exam 2
